kreport.name: redoRate_bz

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: select v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.type='分公司' and v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: --受理工单清单 select decode(f.startercode,'8a92634621adf551012112e3edf60003','深圳分公司',o2.org_name ) 分公司, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,sec_org o1,sec_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and i.organigerdeptid=o1.id and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,8) and f.status!='XJ' and f.startercode not in( '8a92634621adf5510121ae02a34f0003', --10000号主办 '8a92634621adf5510121ae034eff0003', --10000号协查 '8a91a29124466980012446a13077008b' --电子运维 ) #[and i.area=${area}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] #[and o2.org_name=${org_name}] #[--${org_name}]and decode(f.startercode,'8a92634621adf551012112e3edf60003','深圳分公司',o2.org_name ) like '%分公司'
